TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit JpegBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class JpegBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Joint Photographics Experts Group (JPEG) format images.

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Joint Photographics Experts Group (JPEG) format images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] 형식 비트맵 프레임 수준 축소판 그림 및 프레임 수준 메타 데이터를 지원합니다. format bitmaps support frame level thumbnails and frame level metadata. 미리 보기, 전역 축소판 그림, 전역 메타 데이터 또는 여러 프레임은 지원 하지 않습니다.They do not support preview, global thumbnails, global metadata, or multiple frames. 인코딩 부분 신뢰에서 작동 하지 않습니다.Encoding does not work in partial trust. 참조 [WPF 부분 신뢰 보안](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) 부분 신뢰에 대 한 내용은 합니다.See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped horizontally during encoding.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped horizontally during encoding.

value.span: 인코딩; 동안 이미지를 가로로 대칭 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 합니다.

span.span: if the image is flipped horizontally during encoding; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 텍스트 사용XAML Text Usage 가로 대칭 이동 이란 원본 이미지를 손실 하 고 모든 이전 무손실 변환을 대체 합니다.The horizontal flip represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation. ## Examples 다음 예제에서는의 값을 설정 하는 속성입니다.The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#2)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped vertically during encoding.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped vertically during encoding.

value.span: 인코딩; 동안 이미지를 세로로 대칭 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 합니다.

span.span: if the image is flipped vertically during encoding; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 세로 대칭 이동 이란 원본 이미지를 손실 하 고 모든 이전 무손실 변환을 대체 합니다.The vertical flip represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation. ## Examples 다음 예제에서는의 값을 설정 하는 속성입니다.The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the quality level of the resulting [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the quality level of the resulting [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image.
The quality level of the JPEG image.
The value range is 1 (lowest quality) to 100 (highest quality) inclusive.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 예제에서는의 값을 설정 하는 속성입니다.The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#2)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Imaging::Rotation Rotation { System::Windows::Media::Imaging::Rotation get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Imaging::Rotation value); };
member this.Rotation : System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the degree to which a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image is rotated.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the degree to which a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image is rotated.
The degree to which the image is rotated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 회전 90도 증가분 에서만 지원 됩니다.Rotation is supported only in 90-degree increments. 회전 이란 원본 이미지를 손실 하 고 모든 이전 무손실 변환을 대체 합니다.The rotation represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation. ## Examples 다음 예제에서는의 값을 설정 하는 속성입니다.The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#2)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]
